text: Yara muhajiradera agamanera purbe madinaya basabasa karechila ebam bisbasa sthapana karechila, tara muhajiradera bhalabase, muhajiraderake ya deya hayeche, tajjan'ye tara antare irsaposana kare na ebam nijera abhabagrasta hale'o taderake agradhikara dana kare. Yara manera karpanya theke mukta, tara'i saphalakama.
